pkgmetadata.longdescription: Background-Parallel Jobs // Easily launch, track, and control functions as background-parallel jobs. Includes robust utilities for job status, error handling, resource monitoring, and result collection. Designed for scalable workflows in interactive and automated settings (local or remote). Integrates with multiple backends; supports flexible automation pipelines and live job tracking. For more information, see https://anirbanshaw24.github.io/bakerrr/.
